name: Quest For Glory IV: Shadows of Darkness
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
notes:
MIDI does not work without additional setup.

To get better quality MIDI audio (might require additional packages):
  I - Need to install fluid-soundfont-gm and fluidsynth.  For Mint 19:
sudo apt install -y fluid-soundfont-gm fluidsynth
  II - Open terminal and run the command (needs to be run each time you want to play):
fluidsynth -l -s -i -aalsa -o audio.alsa.device=default /usr/share/sounds/sf2/FluidR3_GM.sf2
  III - Start the game.

To get MIDI audio without additional packages:
   I - Configure --> Game Options --> Main File --> Select 'dosboxQG4_settings.conf'
   II - Run the game and you'll start the Setup
   III - Choose Music --> Sound Blaster / AdLib (or compatibles)
   IV - Accept these choices and save configuration
   V - Configure --> Game Options --> Main File --> Select 'dosboxQG4_single.conf'
  VI - Start the game.

write_file.content:
[ipx]
 # ipx: Enable ipx over UDP/IP emulation.

 ipx=false


[autoexec]
 @echo off
 mount C ".."
 c:
 cls
 INSTALL.EXE
 cls
 exit

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxQG4_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxQG4.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
- write_file:
    content: "[ipx]\n # ipx: Enable ipx over UDP/IP emulation.\n\n ipx=false\n\n\n\
      [autoexec]\n @echo off\n mount C \"..\"\n c:\n cls\n INSTALL.EXE\n cls\n exit"
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4_settings.conf
main_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxQG4_single.conf
